scripts.setup: npm ci --ignore-scripts && npm run contracts && npm run vendor && npm run build
scripts.contracts: cd solidity && npm ci --ignore-scripts && npm run compile
scripts.vendor: tsc --project tsconfig.vendor.json && node --enable-source-maps ./build/vendor.mjs && node --input-type=module -e "import { promises as fs } from 'fs'; await fs.rm('./build/vendor.mjs')"
